name: Anika Rahman
bio: Focused on nurturing low-light indoor plants, guiding proper propagation techniques, and providing effective pest prevention and gentle treatment solutions for long-term plant health.

name: Rafi Hossain
bio: Expert in creating balanced soil mixes, designing precise watering schedules, and crafting bonsai-style plant shaping techniques for healthy, compact growth.

name: Maya Khan
bio: Specializes in creating ideal humidity zones, maintaining vibrant foliage, and offering detailed guidance for tropical plant health, growth, and long-term care.

name: Jahid Ali
bio: Diagnoses common plant pests and diseases, identifies root causes, and provides personalized recovery and long-term care plans to restore plant health.
